section.heading: Limitations on expenditures.
section.text: Total real property tax abatements provided for certain urban farms established pursuant to § 47-868 and the tax-exempt status conferred by § 47-1005(c) shall not exceed $150,000 each year.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 6182 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
